panels.description: Total number of requests during this time period - the time range in the upper right corner

targets.expr: sum(increase(nginx_ingress_controller_requests{ controller_class=~"$controller_class", ingress=~"$ingress", namespace=~"$namespace", controller_pod=~"$pod"}[${__range_s}s]))

panels.title: Current Requests

panels.description: The percentage of successful requests during the entire period is displayed in the upper right corner. Note: 404s are ignored in this metric because 404 is a normal response for error/invalid requests. This helps prevent the percentage from being affected by typical web scanners and security probes.
panels.title: Current Request Success Rate

panels.description: This is the number of new connections established with the controller in the last minute. Note: This metric does not support Ingress or Namespace variables as it operates at a lower level than the actual application. It supports other variables (Env, Controller ns Class, Pod).

targets.expr: sum(avg_over_time(nginx_ingress_controller_nginx_process_connections{state=~"active", state=~"active",  controller_class=~"$controller_class", controller_pod=~"$pod"}[$__interval]))

panels.title: New Connections

panels.description: Number of HTTP requests made in the last 1-minute window

targets.expr: sum(increase(nginx_ingress_controller_requests{ controller_class=~"$controller_class", ingress=~"$ingress", namespace=~"$namespace", controller_pod=~"$pod"}[$__interval]))

panels.title: HTTP Requests

panels.description: This is the percentage of successful requests in the last minute. Note: 404s are ignored in this metric since a 404 is a normal response for errant requests.

targets.expr:
sum(rate(nginx_ingress_controller_requests{status!~"[4-5].*", controller_class=~"$controller_class", ingress=~"$ingress", namespace=~"$namespace", controller_pod=~"$pod"}[$__interval])) / 
(sum(rate(nginx_ingress_controller_requests{ controller_class=~"$controller_class", ingress=~"$ingress", namespace=~"$namespace", controller_pod=~"$pod"}[$__interval])) - 
(sum(rate(nginx_ingress_controller_requests{status=~"404|499", controller_class=~"$controller_class", ingress=~"$ingress", namespace=~"$namespace", controller_pod=~"$pod"}[$__interval])) or vector(0)))

panels.title: % Success (2m)

panels.description: This is the number of successful requests in the last minute. According to standard HTTP definitions, success is 1xx or 2xx.

targets.expr: sum(increase(nginx_ingress_controller_requests{status=~"(1|2).*",  controller_class=~"$controller_class", ingress=~"$ingress", namespace=~"$namespace", controller_pod=~"$pod"}[$__interval])) or vector(0)

panels.title: HTTP 1/2xx (2m)

panels.description: This is the number of 3xx requests in the last minute.

targets.expr: sum(increase(nginx_ingress_controller_requests{status=~"3.*",  controller_class=~"$controller_class", ingress=~"$ingress", namespace=~"$namespace", controller_pod=~"$pod"}[2m]))  or vector(0)

panels.title: HTTP 3xx (2m)

panels.description: This is the number of 4xx requests in the last minute.

targets.expr: sum(increase(nginx_ingress_controller_requests{status=~"4.*",  controller_class=~"$controller_class", ingress=~"$ingress", namespace=~"$namespace", controller_pod=~"$pod"}[$__interval]))  or vector(0)

panels.title: HTTP 4xx (2m)

panels.description: This is the number of 5xx requests in the last minute.

targets.expr: sum(increase(nginx_ingress_controller_requests{status=~"5.*", controller_class=~"$controller_class", ingress=~"$ingress", namespace=~"$namespace", controller_pod=~"$pod"}[$__interval])) or vector(0)

panels.title: HTTP 5xx (2m)

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.50, sum(label_join(rate(nginx_ingress_controller_request_duration_seconds_bucket{host=~"$host", path=~"$path"}[1m]), "url", "", "host", "path")) by (le, url, method, status, ingress)) > -1

histogram_quantile(0.90, sum(label_join(rate(nginx_ingress_controller_request_duration_seconds_bucket{host=~"$host", path=~"$path"}[1m]), "url", "", "host", "path")) by (le, url, method, status, ingress)) > -1

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(label_join(rate(nginx_ingress_controller_request_duration_seconds_bucket{host=~"$host", path=~"$path"}[1m]), "url", "", "host", "path")) by (le, url, method, status, ingress)) > -1
sum(label_join(irate(nginx_ingress_controller_request_size_sum{host=~"$host", path=~"$path"}[$__rate_interval]), "url", "", "host", "path")) by (url)
sum(label_join(irate(nginx_ingress_controller_response_size_sum{host=~"$host", path=~"$path"}[$__rate_interval]), "url", "", "host", "path")) by (url)

panels.description: HTTP Requests/Access This is the total number of requests broken down by ingress. This can help us get the proportion between each other.

targets.expr: sum(increase(nginx_ingress_controller_requests{ controller_class=~"$controller_class", ingress=~"$ingress", namespace=~"$namespace", controller_pod=~"$pod"}[$__interval:15s])) by (ingress)

panels.title: HTTP Requests/Access

panels.description: HTTP Status Codes Breakdown of various HTTP status codes for requests processed during this period, matching the variables selected above. This chart helps notice and gain insight into which service is failing and the type of failure.

targets.expr: sum(increase(nginx_ingress_controller_requests{ controller_class=~"$controller_class", ingress=~"$ingress", namespace=~"$namespace", controller_pod=~"$pod"}[$__interval:15s])) by (status)

panels.title: HTTP Status Codes

panels.description: Total HTTP Requests Total number of HTTP requests made during each time period

targets.expr: sum(increase(nginx_ingress_controller_requests{ controller_class=~"$controller_class", ingress=~"$ingress", namespace=~"$namespace", controller_pod=~"$pod"}[$__interval:15s]))

panels.title: Total HTTP Requests by Time Period

targets.expr: sum (irate (nginx_ingress_controller_request_size_sum{node=~"$node"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum (irate (nginx_ingress_controller_response_size_sum{node=~"$node"}[$__rate_interval]))
avg(nginx_ingress_controller_nginx_process_resident_memory_bytes{node=~"$node"})
sum(rate(nginx_ingress_controller_nginx_process_cpu_seconds_total{node=~"$node"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.description: Latency (Average Percentiles) This chart can help evaluate and assist us in meeting SLA requirements regarding our services' response time. To view more detailed latency graphs broken down by ingress, please open the closed tab at the bottom as it is very CPU intensive.
panels.title: Latency (Average Percentiles)

panels.description:
This graph can help assess and help us meet SLA requirements as far as the responsive time of our services.

For a more detailed latency graph broken out by ingress please open the closed tab at the bottom because it is very CPU intensive.
panels.title: Latency Heatmap

panels.description: Note: This does not apply to each ingress/namespace. This is the number of new connections opened by the controller.

targets.expr: sum(increase(nginx_ingress_controller_nginx_process_connections{state=~"active",  controller_class=~"$controller_class", controller_pod=~"$pod"}[$__interval:15s]))

panels.title: New Connections Opened (Controller/Ingress Pod)

panels.description: Note: This does not apply to each ingress/namespace. Total number of connections opened to our ingress. If you have a CDN in front of our service, it's unusual for this to be very low. If/when we use something like websockets for persistent connections, this may/will be very high.

targets.expr: sum(avg_over_time(nginx_ingress_controller_nginx_process_connections{state=~"active", state=~"active",  controller_class=~"$controller_class", controller_pod=~"$pod"}[$__range]))

panels.title: Total Connections Opened (Controller/Ingress Pod)

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(nginx_ingress_controller_request_duration_seconds_bucket{status!="404",status!="500", controller_class=~"$controller_class", ingress=~"$ingress", namespace=~"$namespace", controller_pod=~"$pod"}[5m])) by (le, ingress))

histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(nginx_ingress_controller_request_duration_seconds_bucket{status!="404",status!="500", controller_class=~"$controller_class", ingress=~"$ingress", namespace=~"$namespace", controller_pod=~"$pod"}[5m])) by (le, ingress))

histogram_quantile(0.90, sum(rate(nginx_ingress_controller_request_duration_seconds_bucket{status!="404",status!="500", controller_class=~"$controller_class", ingress=~"$ingress", namespace=~"$namespace", controller_pod=~"$pod"}[5m])) by (le, ingress))

title: Ingress Nginx / Status Codes and Latency
